topic: Explosion at Bandar Abbas Port, Iran
claims: At least 14 people have been killed and 750 injured.
The explosion is likely linked to chemicals being stored.
The explosion was not related to refineries, fuel tanks, or oil pipelines.
A state of emergency has been declared in Bandar Abbas.
Citizens are advised to stay indoors and avoid outdoor activities.
intent: Report on the explosion and its impact
